definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: It was an electroscope which contained a small amount of radium.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個驗電器，其中載有少量的鐳。

sentences.english: When the fur is removed from the vicinity of the electroscope , the leaves return to the original angle.
sentences.chinese: 當毛皮從驗電器旁邊拿走後，金箔又恢復原來的角度。

sentences.english: Her electroscope was a metal case with two holes in its side.
sentences.chinese: 她的驗電器是一個金屬盒子，旁邊有兩個小孔。
